item.description:
Hi everyone!
Kimberly suggested this great meet up at Peabody Essex Museum!
"Lunar New Year Events at the Peabody Essex Museum "
Let's have a meet up at the Peabody Essex Museum in Salem, on Saturday Feb. 27th. The Museum will be celebrating the Lunar New Year 2010 with events and exhibits for families.
Check out this link for some more details.
http://pem.org/calend...

Meet up time listed currently is tentative, we can talk among each other to figure out what would be the best time to meet. I'll definately be there!

PS- BTW- you can get free passes to Peabody Essex Museum at your local library!!!!!!

I hope more of you can join us. Husbands welcome! Friends welcome! Kids welcome!!!!

Any questions? Feel free to email me at nuhmoeya@hotmail.com
item.how_to_find_us: I'll tie a balloon or something!
item.name: Lunar New Year Events at the Peabody Essex Museum
